Class Booking

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Booking
public class Booking extends Object
Represents a booking in the flight booking system. This class contains details about the booking, including the booking ID, customer, flight, booking date, cost, cancellation status, and cancellation fee.
Version:
main
Author:
UmaeerH, AnisaU

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(int id, Customer customer, Flight flight, double cost, LocalDate bookingDate, boolean cancelled, double canCost)
      Constructs a new Booking with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - the booking ID
      customer - the customer associated with the booking
      flight - the flight associated with the booking
      cost - the cost of the booking
      bookingDate - the date of the booking
      cancelled - the cancellation status of the booking
      canCost - the cancellation fee
